meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to conceive children.
meanings.sent1: Many couples struggle with infertility and seek medical help.
meanings.sent2: Infertility can be a challenging issue for those dreaming of starting a family.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show highlighted the humorous side of dealing with infertility.
meanings.sent4: Her barren garden was a metaphor for the infertility of her creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The image of the empty nest symbolized the infertility of their hopes for a big family.
